definitions.definition: The fact or act of surviving; continued existence or life.
definitions.example: His survival in the open ocean was a miracle; he had fully expected to die.

definitions.definition: (as a modifier) Of, relating to or aiding survival.
definitions.example: His survival kit had all the things he needed in the wilderness.

definitions.definition: The avoidance of relegation or demotion to a lower league or division.
A custom or belief that persists in folklore from earlier times, when the rationale behind it is forgotten.
